question: Where is Odessa located in Ukraine?
true_answer: On the northwestern coast of the Black Sea.
asked_question_translated: OÃ¹ se situe Odessa en Ukraine ?
answer: Odessa se situe au sud-ouest de l'Ukraine, sur les rives de la mer Noire.
answer_translated_eng: Odessa lies in south-west Ukraine, on the shores of the Black Sea.
